sources.title: Django The Bastard
sources.description: A mysterious stranger appears to take terrifying revenge on former Confederate officers who during the Civil War betrayed and were responsible for the massacre of their unit.

metadata.Plot: With revenge etched on his mind, a mysterious, gaunt man in black, with his face hidden behind a wide-brimmed felt hat, walks into a dusty town. It's been many years since the ruthless betrayal of the former Confederate officers, Murdock, Hawkins, and Ross, and now, the black-clad avenger, who's been left for dead, comes back from the afterlife carrying grim wooden crosses bearing their names and the date of their death. People call him Django, and he is hell-bent on revenge. Who can stop Django, the ghost-like one-man army?
metadata.Actors: Anthony Steffen, Paolo Gozlino, Luciano Rossi
